Topics of interest: Finance academics and fintechs, future of finance, academic and fintech/practitioner tracks, presentations, keynotes and panel discussions. There are opportunities for early-stage work, case studies, slide decks and proposals for panel discussions.

Conference: Johns Hopkins Carey Finance Conference

Topics of interest: All areas of finance, particularly early-stage papers that would benefit from feedback and discussion

Conference: TSE Industrial Organisation & Finance Conference

Conference: Politics in Finance 2025 Conference
